snippet: The network that built franchises around "The Simpsons'' and "Family Guy'' will create new animated shows that will be distributed across multiple platforms.
abstract: The network that built franchises around "The Simpsons'' and "Family Guy'' will create new animated shows that will be distributed across multiple platforms.
lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. - Emphasizing its history as the network that built a franchise around animated comedy shows like "The Simpsons" and "Family Guy," Fox announced here on Sunday an ambitious plan to create a block of cartoon shows that would play in the late-night hour on Saturday.

headline.main: Fox Plans Block of Cartoon Shows for Late Night on Saturdays
